title: Sex Dreams & SexEd for Teens with Anne Hodder-Shipp
itunes:title: Sex Dreams & SexEd for Teens with Anne Hodder-Shipp
itunes:subtitle: On today’s show, Emily is joined by sex educator & dream-worker Anne Hodder-Shipp to talk about sex dreams, and they’re taking your calls & answering your questions.  They discuss what sex dreams really mean & if there are any...
description:
On today’s show, Emily is joined by sex educator & dream-worker Anne Hodder-Shipp to talk about sex dreams, and they’re taking your calls & answering your questions. 

They discuss what sex dreams really mean & if there are any truths behind them, ways to talk to teens about sex education without blaming or shaming, & how to have more connected sex with woman-on-top. Plus, a g-spot & p-spot location tutorial! 


Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For even more sex talk, tips, & tricks visit sexwithemily.com

For more information on Anne Hodder-Shipp, click HERE. 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
